H0.text: Air is the source of the energy that is stored in food originally.

H1.text: Soil is the original source of the energy that is stored in food.

H2.text: Sunlight is the source of the energy that is stored in food originally.

H3.text: Water is the source from which the energy stored in food originally comes.

A4.text: Photosynthesis converts light energy, typically from sunlight, into chemical energy stored in carbohydrates.

A5.text: Water is split during light-dependent reactions, but the energy stored in food originates from sunlight, not water.
